pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:5.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:5.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ anuvattati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:6.1: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:6.2: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ anuvattissatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:6.3: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ anuvattatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:6.6: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ gaddhabādhipubbaṃ anuvattissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:6.7: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:6.8: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:7.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaraṃ appaṭikāraṃ akatasahāyaṃ tamanuvatteyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi evamassa vacanīyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:7.2: ‘eso kho, ayye, bhikkhu samaggena saṃghena ukkhitto dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaro appaṭikāro akatasahāyo, māyye, etaṃ bhikkhuṃ anuvattī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:7.3: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya, sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:7.4: Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamānā taṃ paṭinissajjeyya, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:7.5: No ce paṭinissajjeyya, ayampi pārājikā hoti asaṃvāsā ukkhittānuvattikā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:8.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:10.2: āpattiyā adassane vā appaṭikamme vā appaṭinissagge vā ukkhitto.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:13.2: saṃghaṃ vā gaṇaṃ vā puggalaṃ vā kammaṃ vā nādiyati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:15.3: So tehi saddhiṃ natthi, tena vuccati akatasahāyoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:16.2: yaṃdiṭṭhiko so hoti yaṃkhantiko yaṃruciko, sāpi taṃdiṭṭhikā hoti taṃkhantikā taṃrucikā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:18.2: aññāhi bhikkhunīhi. Yā passanti yā suṇanti tāhi vattabbā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:18.3: “eso kho, ayye, bhikkhu samaggena saṃghena ukkhitto dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaro appaṭikāro akatasahāyo.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:18.11: “eso kho, ayye, bhikkhu samaggena saṃghena ukkhitto dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaro appaṭikāro akatasahāyo.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:19.2: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaraṃ appaṭikāraṃ akatasahāyaṃ tamanuvattati, sā taṃ vatthuṃ na paṭinissajjati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:19.3: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāseyya tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:20.2: Ayaṃ itthannāmā bhikkhunī samaggena saṃghena ukkhittaṃ bhikkhuṃ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anādaraṃ appaṭikāraṃ akatasahāyaṃ tamanuvattati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:20.4: Saṃgho itthannāmaṃ bhikkhuniṃ samanubhāsati tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:20.5: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā samanubhāsanā tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:22.1: Samanubhaṭṭhā saṃghena itthannāmā bhikkhunī tassa vatthussa paṭinissaggāya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:22.2: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:25.2: seyyathāpi nāma puthusilā dvedhā bhinnā appaṭisandhikā hoti, evameva bhikkhunī yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantī assamaṇī hoti asakyadhītā. Tena vuccati pārājikā hotīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:26.2: saṃvāso nāma ekakammaṃ ekuddeso samasikkhatā. Eso saṃvāso nāma.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:26.3: So tāya saddhiṃ natthi. Tena vuccati asaṃvāsāti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:27.1: Dhammakamme dhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pārājikassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:27.2: Dhammakamme vematikā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pārājikassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pj7:27.3: Dhammakamme adhammakammasaññā na paṭinissajjati, āpatti pārājikassa.
